name: Traffic Racer 3D World
description:
Car racing cars in different cities world experienced the excitement of the game.

Traffic Racer racing facilities with car traffic in 4 different cities in the world with 3D World.
New city and an exciting new game it bekiy cars.
Taxi driving, driving pickups and truck driving pleasure combined in a single game.
The game has a distinctive opening theme. You'll love the music.

Features

3D graphic design. Color Wheel and purchase options.
mesh in 4 different cities in the world and will take the lead in the region.
opportunity to earn points by collecting top model vehicles.
Auto racing excitement.
Spectacular and late-model cars
camera options that allow a different view.
